name: WP Paint – WordPress Image Editor
author: ZetaMatic

sections.description:
WP Paint – WordPress Image Editor is a browser based HTML5 Image Editor for WordPress media images. It has an intuitive interface resembling most common Desktop based Photo Editors with an extensive array of Image Editing, Photo Manipulation and Photo Editing Features.

Features

  • Image editor with an intuitive desktop Photo Editor like interface
  • Ability to Manage Layers
  • Flip, Rotate or Resize images
  • Add Custom Text to images
  • Crop images
  • Apply Blur effects to images
  • Turn images to Grayscale
  • Change Hue of images
  • Adjust image brightness contrast
  • Add shapes on top of images

Installation and Overview Video Demo

Pro Version

The Pro version of this plugin has some really cool features.
Upgrade to WP Paint Pro version for an extensive set of advanced tools and features.

Pro Features

  • Stickers
    Add cool stickers to your image and make your images look interesting & attractive.

  • Watermark
    You can add a Watermark to your pictures and keep these safe from copying.

  • Clone Tool
    This tool is used to copy regions of pixels from one location to another. The source and destination can be on the same layer or different layers within the same image.

  • Revisions
    WP Paint Pro offers easy access to older image revisions and the ability to restore to any of them as required.

  • Search and Insert Images
    Want to add more images to your image, You can easily do that with WP Paint. Link your Pixabay account, search and add as many images as you want.

  • Non Admin User Access
    With WP Paint Pro non-admin users can access the WP Paint Pro Editor. Any user with upload files permission can use WP Paint Pro to edit their images.

And many more…
sections.installation:
1. Login to your WordPress dashboard and navigate to Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for “WP Paint”.
  3. Click “Install”.
  4. Click “Activate”.
  5. Once the plugin is activated, you can see “Edit Image using WP Paint” link next to the “Edit Image” link on all your media browsers.
sections.faq:
Can I edit the images like desktop Photo Editor?

Yes, you can edit the images like a desktop Photo Editor, but with browser level limitations.

Will this plugin work with my theme?

Yes, absolutely the plugin should work with your theme without any issue.

Will this plugin work with Gutenberg Editor?

Yes, the plugin has been tested to work with the Gutenberg editor without any issue.

Will this plugin work with any Page Builder?

Yes, the plugin should work with all types of Page Builder without any issue.

Do you have any pro version of this plugin?

Yes, absolutely we have the pro version of this plugin with extended features. You can purchase the pro version right from here.

I have a suggestion for the plugin. How should I contact you?

We are always looking for feedback from you. Whether it’s a completely new plugin or adding some custom functionality to any existing plugin, we are always ready to do that. You can contact us at info@zetamatic.com
